CustomField.formula: IF(Loop__Template__c="", IF( RecordType.Name = "SMTP Service", "Use Subject and Email Text fields below or ", "" ) & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?cioId=" & Id, "Select Email Template","_self"), HYPERLINK("/" & Loop__Template__c & "/s?id=" & Loop__Template__c & "&previewMode=1", IMAGE("/img/icon/mail16.png", "Preview") & " Preview","_blank") & " " & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?cioId=" & Id, "[Change]","_self")& " " & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?cioId=" & Id & "&ic=None", "[None]","_self"))
CustomField.label: Email Template
